definition: to stew in soy sauce and spices
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: The brine is of the composite formation mechanism of sedimentary transformation and the dissolution and filtration of solid potassium salts.
sentences.chinese: 卤水为沉积变质水和固态钾盐溶滤水的复合成因。

sentences.english: Brine purifying is very important to productions of the vacuum salt.
sentences.chinese: 卤水净化是真空制盐的一个重要生产环节。

sentences.english: Calcium sulphate whisker was prepared by hydrothermal method using seawater or brine as raw material.
sentences.chinese: 以海水卤水为原料，采用水热法制备了硫酸钙晶须。

sentences.english: In the paper, a new method of separating sodium sulphates from bittern by way of ammoniating and alcoholizing has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了用醇氨化法使盐矿卤水除硝的新方法。

sentences.english: The difference of magnesia between sea water and brine is discussed in particular.
sentences.chinese: 特别是讨论了海水与卤水镁砂之间的区别。

sentences.english: The characteristics of sea water and brine magnesia are described.
sentences.chinese: 详述了海水与卤水镁砂的特点。

sentences.english: Bring plum wine spicy sauce to the boil over medium heat. Remove to cool.
sentences.chinese: 把梅酒卤水料放锅内以中火煮滚，离火待凉。

sentences.english: The intercrystalline unconfined brine has extensively arrived at the stage of sylvite-precipitation.
sentences.chinese: 晶间潜卤水已普遍进入钾石盐析出阶段。

sentences.english: The process of acceptance brine by bittern of Ye county were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了利用叶县卤水制合格盐水的工艺。

sentences.english: The ore-forming fluid is mainly vadose hot brine.
sentences.chinese: 成矿流体以渗流热卤水为主。

sentences.english: The boric recovery from a bittern liquid was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 论述了从卤水中回收硼的试验研究情况。

sentences.english: The research and development of magnesia from sea water and brine in China are demonstrated.
sentences.chinese: 文章论证了我国海水和卤水镁砂的研究与开发。

sentences.english: This essay introduces a way of preparing sodium nitrate from brine by ion ex-change technology.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了用离子交换从卤水中制取硝酸钠的方法。

sentences.english: Moreover the opinions of the development of magnesia from sea water or brine in China are proposed.
sentences.chinese: 而且，提出了我国海水与卤水镁砂发展意见。

sentences.english: There are different processes according to the kind of brine .
sentences.chinese: 针对不同类型的卤水，相应有不同的净化工艺流程。

sentences.english: The results showed that the boiling point of brine with sodium nitrate would be reduced when the pressure was reduced.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，压力降低，含硝酸钠卤水的沸点也降低。

definition: raw materials for making soup/packaged soup mix
to stew in soy sauce and spices
ingredients (in a cooking recipe)/to mix materials according to directions
umami, one of the five basic tastes (cookery)
